content:
Hi ,
I was trying to convert a R3 resource to R4 but I am getting the below metioned error :

java -jar org.hl7.fhir.validator.jar PatientSTU3.json -transform http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureMap/XX3to4 -ig hl7.fhir.transforms.v4v3 -output PatientR4.json
FHIR Validation tool Version 4.0.31-SNAPSHOT - Built 2019-11-05T15:35:39.648+11:00 - Git a0ece162e77c
Detected Java version: 1.8.0_181 from C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.8.0_181 on amd64 (64bit). 1796MB available
Arguments: PatientSTU3.json -transform http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureMap/XX3to4 -ig hl7.fhir.transforms.v4v3 -output PatientR4.json
.. connect to tx server @ http://tx.fhir.org
.. definitions from hl7.fhir.core#current
(v4.1.0)
+ .. load IG from hl7.fhir.transforms.v4v3
Exception in thread "main" org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRException: Unable to resolve the package 'hl7.fhir.transforms.v4v3'
at org.hl7.fhir.utilities.cache.PackageCacheManager.loadPackage(PackageCacheManager.java:595)
at org.hl7.fhir.r5.validation.ValidationEngine.resolvePackage(ValidationEngine.java:683)
at org.hl7.fhir.r5.validation.ValidationEngine.fetchByPackage(ValidationEngine.java:672)
at org.hl7.fhir.r5.validation.ValidationEngine.loadIgSource(ValidationEngine.java:523)
at org.hl7.fhir.r5.validation.ValidationEngine.loadIg(ValidationEngine.java:775)
at org.hl7.fhir.r5.validation.Validator.main(Validator.java:496)
We are interested in this functionality also.
